segments.text: Hurry up ! Mom , I can't wait any more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look out , honey . Let's come to the shoal waters . Follow me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , Mom . Can I swim now ? I want to learn butterfly stroke .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , listen to me . First , you should learn how to breathe in and breathe out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mom , it's so terrible . Water went down into my throat and I almost got drowned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do be patient , Honey . Let's do it slowly and correctly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , Mom , I think I'm not the right person for swimming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on , sweetie , you've done very well . It is the first step that is tough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , I'll make up my mind . Please correct me if any of my movements go wrong .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , well done . That's the way to go . How clever you are ! You've got it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I can't believe it . Everything is possible to a willing heart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exactly , next , you should hold your legs together and extend your arms above your head .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , like a dolphin . Am I on the right track ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the way to go . Now , you are flying , my boy .
segments.speaker: S2
